Issue.creator: farooq_m_khan
Issue.summary: Sovrin-Client: Incorrect sample path in getting Started Guide
Issue.description: /sample/faber-invitation.sovrin{code} fable-invitation.sovrin file does not exist in this path. If you try to locate it on the system, it is present at: {code:java} vagrant@agent01:~$ find / -name faber-invitation.sovrin 2>/dev/null /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/sample/faber-invitation.sovrin {code} The solution to the problem is not fixing the documentation its a bug in where the file is installed. >
